rows.label: qst202701_msg0001
rows.name:
Mo mo? Why are you looking
around so much, mo?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0002
rows.name: Are you looking for someone, mo?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0003
rows.name: I am, mo.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0004
rows.name:
Lately, my daughter has been going
out in the middle of the night, mo.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm worried, so I've been
searching all over for her, mo.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0006
rows.name:
If your daughter is wandering
around, it's natural for
a parent to worry.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0007
rows.name:
Says the prince who
wanders around all year.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0008
rows.name: Ahahahaha!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0009
rows.name: Wh-what's so funny, mo?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0010
rows.name:
Aren't you being a
little overprotective?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0011
rows.name:
Not at all, mo! It's
natural for a parent, mo!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0012
rows.name:
Hmph, when I was young, I played
with the night much more.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0013
rows.name:
When you were young? You were
only awakened recently.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0014
rows.name: You're practically a newborn.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0015
rows.name:
Saika, Zeke, you don't get it. Memories
aren't carved into the head...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202701_msg0016
rows.name:
they're carved into
the soul... the Core.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0017
rows.name: [ML:Dash ]Ah, is that so.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0018
rows.name:
You too, Nopon, didn't you
surrender yourself to the night
and play when you were young?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0019
rows.name:
Mo mo! Indeed, when I was young, I
often got burned by my nightlife...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202701_msg0020
rows.name:
Then shouldn't you be a bit more tolerant
of your daughter's fun? If you tighten
the reins, she'll just rebel. Like me.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0021
rows.name: No, this is a different matter, mo!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0022
rows.name: How is it different?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0023
rows.name:
Actually, it seems my daughter
is attending a strange gathering
every night, mo...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202701_msg0024
rows.name: A gathering? Even better!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0025
rows.name: Not better, mo!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0026
rows.name:
A shady religion called the World Ruin Cult
<Anfang Euthanasie> is popular among the youth,
and my daughter seems to be a part of it, mo!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0027
rows.name:
The World Ruin Cult <Anfang
Euthanasie>, huh...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202701_msg0028
rows.name: Do you know it, Mei?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0029
rows.name: No, but I think the name is cool!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0030
rows.name: Tora too! I think it's super cool, mo!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0031
rows.name: It has a dark and cool feel to it, mo!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0032
rows.name:
As expected of Tora
and Hana! You get it!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0033
rows.name: Let's just ignore these two...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202701_msg0034
rows.name:
But if that World Ruin Cult
is some kind of bad group,
isn't that a problem?

rows.label: qst202701_msg0035
rows.name: You're right. Let's check it out!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0036
rows.name:
Really, mo?! That would
be a great help, mo!

rows.label: qst202701_msg0037
rows.name:
First, we need to find out what kind
of group this World Ruin Cult is.

rows.label: qst202701_msg0038
rows.name:
Let's talk to different people
and gather information.
